attributes.action: Delay ofsted going in to schools whilst covid still around
attributes.additional_details: Teachers under enough stress with a catch up curriculum, teaching in masks, children in masks, windows wide open therefore cold classrooms.  It’s not safe enough yet to have strangers in our bubbles even if they do wear masks.
attributes.background: Delay ofsted going into schools till next September.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567580
